data.title: Travelers - Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport (GSP)
data.meta_description: Travel Update: Terminal Roadway Improvement Project (TRIP) Construction Underway Construction on airport roadways may impact your visit to GSP. LEARN MORE Flight Information Parking Status View parking status by lot here Security Wait Times Checkpoint opens at 4:00 a.m. Parking Where To Park at GSP Save time and money by reserving secure and convenient parking […]
data.text:
Southwest Adds Daily Nonstop Flights to Nashville

Southwest Airlines will expand service at GSP with the addition of a new daily nonstop route to Nashville International Airport (BNA) and increased frequency to Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport (BWI).

Breeze Airways Announces Service from GSP with Five Destinations

Breeze Airways announced that the airline will begin new service at Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport (GSP) this May, bringing low fares and travel convenience to the Upstate South Carolina region.

Southwest Airlines Expands Service at GSP

Southwest Airlines announces an expansion of its presence at Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport (GSP) with the addition of new nonstop service to Denver International Airport (DEN) beginning June 8, 2024.

GSP Honored as a Best Place to Work in SC

Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport has been named one of the 2023 Best Places to Work in South Carolina. This honor is awarded …

GSP Welcomes New VP and Chief Financial Officer

The Greenville-Spartanburg Airport District welcomes Thomas Brooks as its new Vice President and Chief Financial Officer. As CFO, Mr. Brooks …

Avelo Airlines Adds New Nonstop Service from Wilmington, DE

Avelo Airlines is expanding its footprint at Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport (GSP) with the addition of a third route. The airline announced today that it will add new nonstop flights from Delaware’s Wilmington Airport (ILG) to GSP in June 2023.

GSP Adds Thanks Again Loyalty Program

Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport (GSP) is excited to be added to the Thanks Again loyalty program network as part of our ongoing commitment to offer a better airport experience.

Maersk Announces New Cargo Service from GSP to Shenyang, China

LA.P. Moller – Maersk announced new scheduled cargo service from Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport (GSP) to Shenyang Taoxian International Airport (SHE). …

GSP Recognized as Best Small Airport in North America in 2022

GSP was recognized by Airports Council International with five 2022 Airport Service Quality awards highlighting the world’s best airports as judged by their customers.
